QuestData.Title: The Skyhorn Tribe
QuestData.Description: The Skyhorn people are some of the greatest pathfinders and hunters this world has ever known.$b$bThey are a proud people, but should be willing to listen to reason.$b$bIf the roads feel unsafe, you may ask any flight master in Highmountain to fly you there.$b$bPlease, $p, go to their leader Lasan and remind him that only together, we are Highmountain.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha ha! And what are you, tiny creature? Have you come to battle us or join us in battle?
